mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('now()', ' Unique_Click ',JSON_OBJECT('svcTpCode','','chrgTpCode','01' ,'yyyymmdd',PARTDT ,'platform',(case when left(ADPRODUCT,1)='m' then '02' else '01' end) ,'product',(case when ADPRODUCT='mbe' then '03' when ADPRODUCT='mbw' then '01' when ADPRODUCT='ico' then '03' when ADPRODUCT='mnt' then '07' when ADPRODUCT='nor' then '01' when ADPRODUCT='pnt' then '07' when ADPRODUCT='nct' then '05' when ADPRODUCT='mct' then '05' when ADPRODUCT='mpw' then '08' end) ,'adGubun',B.CODE_ID ,'siteCode',SITECODE,'scriptNo',MEDIA_CODE,'advertiserId',MCODE,'scriptUserId',MEDIA_ID,'type','C' ,'interlock',CASE WHEN MEDIA_ID IN('kakao', 'mkakao') THEN '03' WHEN MEDIA_ID IN('agooglemedia', 'googlemedia', 'mgooglemedia') THEN '04' WHEN MEDIA_ID IN('igaworks', 'igaworks02','igaworksm','igaworksp') THEN '08' WHEN MEDIA_ID IN('rtbmobon') THEN '10' ELSE '01' END ,'keyIp',IP,'clickCnt',1,'point',POINT,'sendDate',DATE_FORMAT(PARTDT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s'), 'hh',CASE WHEN PARTDT=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') THEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H') ELSE '00' END ,'ACTION_NO',(${ACTION_NO}+10000) )) 'data' from dreamsearch.ACTION_LOG A JOIN (select * from dreamsearch.MOBON_COM_CODE where CODE_TP_ID='ADVRTS_TP_CODE' ) B on A.ADGUBUN =B.CODE_VAL where no between ${ACTION_NO} and ${ACTION_NO}+10000 AND PARTDT BETWEEN 20220407 AND 20220426 and `point` >0
